entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 40 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
